chapter.title: Exercise: Data binding for table viewers

section.title: Implement data binding for the table viewer
section.para: Change your implementation of TodoOverviewPart to use data binding.
For this you can delete the LabelProvider of your TableViewerColumn objects. Also remove the viewer.setInput() and the ContentProvider .
The following code demonstrates this implementation.
